alert.note: Alert for Caroline (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 3:44PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Kent and northeastern Caroline Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 344 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ridgely, or 12 miles southeast of Centerville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Denton, Greensboro, Oakland, Ridgely, Goldsboro, Jumptown, Sandtown, Henderson and Marydel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
